title: ‘Truth’ Uses An Old Scandal To Capture Journalism At A Moment Of Transition
text:
‘Truth’ Uses An Old Scandal To Capture Journalism At A Moment Of Transition 
Published By: Uproxx - Today 
The story of Dan Rather and Mary Mapes told in Truth captures journalism in a time of transition (much as Boogie Nights depicts porn at...
